letter.name: Architecture Change Request - Work Without Approval
letter.content:
{{LETTER_HEAD}}
{{DATE}}
{{HOMEOWNER_MAILING}}
Property: {{HOMEOWNER_RESIDENCE}}
Re: {{LETTER_TOPIC}}
Dear {{HOMEOWNER_NAME}},

The Association has discovered that you have begun work on an architectural change to your property without first receiving approval from the Association.

Please immediately halt all work and submit an Architecture Change Request form (included with this letter).

Once your Change Request has been received, it will be reviewed by the Association. Please note, you may still need to receive approval from the City or County depending on the nature of the work being performed.

If you have any questions concerning your account or this request, please contact an agent of the Association.



{{LETTER_SIGNATURE}}


{{LETTER_APPROVER}}
{{LETTER_PERSON}}
